name: sapient
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
intelligent; able to think: She is sapient, conscious, able to hold an intelligent discussion.
wise: his failure to heed my sapient advice the sapient king
relating to the human species Homo sapiens: We may inherit a universal linguistic blueprint from our sapient ancestors of 40,000 years ago.
